name: Line Up: Draw the Criminal
description:
In Line Up: Draw the Criminal let your inner sketch artist roam free, as you help detectives catch criminals.

Using your super sleuthing skills, listen to the victims descriptions to draw what you think the culprit looks like for the line up.

Can you help save the day and catch the master criminal?

Line Up: Draw the Criminal features:
-Draw the culprit
-With colorful artwork
-With multiple levels increasing in difficulty.
-Fun characters
-Become a detective
